resources.string: Would you like to reset your old Talos Rowing settings (recommended)?

Tilt freeze will stop dynamic device orientation detection. You should only continue if your device is hard-attached onto the boat and you have properly leveled it. The adjustment itself will take ${CALIBRATION_SECONDS} seconds, during which the boat should not be touched.

Talos Rowing is an Open Source rowing application. 
 
See http://nargila.org/trac/robostroke for more details. 
 
Android Version ${VERSION} 
 
Copyright © 2016 Tal Shalif 
 
Use at your own risk.

In order to use Talos broadcast/receive functionality, you need to install Talos Remote. 
 
Talos Remote will ask for Networking permissions. 
 
Talos Remote is free - would you like to try it?
File too large. Please record sessions shorter than %d minutes in length
Talos Rowing has crashed. Please send a report to the developer..
An unexpected error has occurred. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click OK.
You might add your comments about the problem below:
